## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2238">Numero di carta di credito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2238">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2239">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2239">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2240">Da 14 a 16 cifre che possono essere formattate o non formattate (dddddddd) e che devono superare il test Luhn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2240">14 to 16 digits that can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and that must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2241">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2241">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2242">Rileva le carte di tutte le principali marche in tutto il mondo, tra cui Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, carte regalo e carte da pranzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2242">Detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2243">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2243">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2244">Yes, il checksum Luhn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2244">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2245">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2245">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2246">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2246">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2247">La funzione Func_credit_card restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2247">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2248">Si verifica una delle situazioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2248">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2249">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_cc_verification.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2249">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2250">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_cc_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2250">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2251">La funzione Func_expiration_date rileva una data nel formato corretto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2251">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2252">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2252">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2253">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2253">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2254">La funzione Func_credit_card restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2254">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2255">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2255">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2515">Croatia driver's license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2515">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2516">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2516">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2517">otto cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2517">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2518">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2518">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2519">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2519">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2520">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2520">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2521">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2521">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2522">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2523">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2523">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2524">L'espressione  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2524">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2525">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2525">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2649">Numero di carta d'identità della Croazia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2649">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2650">Questa entità è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate NUMERO DI IDENTIFICAZIONE NAZIONALE UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2650">This entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2651">È disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2651">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2652">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2652">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2653">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2653">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2654">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2654">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2655">nove cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2655">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2656">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2656">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2657">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2657">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2658">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2658">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2659">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2659">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2660">La funzione Func_croatia_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2660">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2661">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_croatia_id_card da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2661">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2692">Numero di passaporto croato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2692">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2693">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2693">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2694">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2694">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2695">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2695">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2696">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2696">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2697">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2697">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2698">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2698">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2699">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2699">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2700">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2700">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2701">L'espressione  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2701">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2702">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2702">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2703">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2703">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2704">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2704">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2705">L'espressione  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2705">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2706">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2706">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2724">Numero di identificazione personale (OIB) della Croazia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2724">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2725">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2725">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2726">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2726">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2727">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2727">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2728">11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2728">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2729">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2729">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2730">la cifra finale è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2730">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2731">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2731">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2732">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2732">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2733">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2733">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2734">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2734">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2735">La funzione Func_croatia_oib_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2735">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2736">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2736">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2737">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2737">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2738">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2738">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2739">La funzione Func_croatia_oib_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2739">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2740">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2740">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2771">Numero di licenza per i driver di Cipro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2771">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2772">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2772">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2773">12 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2773">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2774">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2774">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2775">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2775">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2776">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2776">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2777">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2777">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2778">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2778">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2779">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2779">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2780">L'espressione  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2780">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2781">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2781">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2906">Carta d'identità di Cipro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2906">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2907">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2907">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2908">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2908">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2909">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2909">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2910">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2910">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2911">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2911">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2912">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2912">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2913">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2913">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2914">10 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2914">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2915">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2915">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2916">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2916">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2917">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2917">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2918">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2918">not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2919">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2919">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2920">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2920">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2921">L'espressione  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2921">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2922">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2922">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2923">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2923">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2927">kimlik karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2927">kimlik karti</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2931">Numero di passaporto di Cipro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2931">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2932">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2932">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2933">una lettera seguita da 6-8 cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2933">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2934">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2934">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2935">una lettera seguita da sei a otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2935">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2936">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2936">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2937">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2937">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2938">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2938">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2939">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2939">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2940">L'espressione  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2940">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2941">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2941">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2942">L'espressione `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` regolare trova la data nel formato GG/MM/AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2942">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2943">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2943">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2944">L'espressione  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2944">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2945">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2945">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2974">Codice fiscale di Cipro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2974">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2975">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2975">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2976">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2976">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2977">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2977">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2978">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2978">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2979">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2979">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2980">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2980">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2981">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2981">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2982">otto cifre e una lettera nello schema specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2982">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2983">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2983">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2984">otto cifre e una lettera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2984">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2985">a "0" o "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2985">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2986">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2986">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2987">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2987">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2988">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2988">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2989">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2989">not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-2990">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2990">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2991">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2991">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2992">La funzione  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2992">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2993">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2993">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-2994">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2994">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-2995">La funzione  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-2995">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3023">Numero di patente di guida ceco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3023">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3024">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3024">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3025">due lettere seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3025">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3026">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3026">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3027">otto lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3027">eight letters and digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3028">lettera "E" (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3028">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3029">Una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3029">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3030">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3030">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3031">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3031">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3032">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3032">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3033">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3033">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3034">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3034">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3035">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3035">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3036">L'espressione  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3036">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3037">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3037">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3038">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3038">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3039">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3039">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3163">Numero di passaporto ceco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3163">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3164">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3164">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3165">otto cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3165">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3166">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3166">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3167">otto cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3167">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3168">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3168">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3169">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3169">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3170">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3170">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3171">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3171">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3172">L'espressione  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3172">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3173">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3173">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3174">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3174">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3175">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3175">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3176">L'espressione  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3176">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3177">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3177">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3199">Numero di identità personale ceco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3199">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3200">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3200">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3201">nove cifre con barra facoltativa (formato precedente) 10 cifre con barra facoltativa (nuovo formato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3201">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3202">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3202">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3203">nove cifre (formato precedente):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3203">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3204">sei cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3204">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3205">una barra facoltativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3205">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3206">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3206">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3207">10 cifre (nuovo formato):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3207">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3208">sei cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3208">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3209">una barra facoltativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3209">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3210">quattro cifre in cui l'ultima cifra è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3210">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3211">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3211">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3212">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3212">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3213">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3213">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3214">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3214">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3215">La funzione Func_czech_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3215">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3216">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_czech_id_card da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3216">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3217">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3217">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3218">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3218">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3219">La funzione Func_czech_id_card_new_format trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3219">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3220">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3267">Numero di patente di guida danimarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3267">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3268">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3268">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3269">otto cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3269">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3270">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3270">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3271">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3271">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3272">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3272">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3273">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3273">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3274">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3274">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3275">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3275">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3276">L'espressione  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3276">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3277">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3277">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3401">Numero di passaporto danimarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3401">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3402">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3402">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3403">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3403">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3404">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3404">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3405">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3405">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3406">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3406">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3407">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3407">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3408">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3408">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3409">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3409">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3410">L'espressione  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3410">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3411">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3411">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3412">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date2` regolare trova la data nel formato GG MM AA o una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3412">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3413">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3413">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3414">L'espressione  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3414">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3415">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3415">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3435">Numero di identificazione personale Danimarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3435">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3436">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3436">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3437">10 cifre contenenti una lineetta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3437">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3438">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3438">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3439">10 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3439">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3440">sei cifre nel formato DDMMYY, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3440">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3441">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3441">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3442">quattro cifre in cui la cifra finale è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3442">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3443">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3444">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3444">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3445">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3446">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3446">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3447">L'espressione regolare Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3447">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3448">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_denmark_id da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3448">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3449">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3449">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3450">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3450">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3451">L'espressione regolare Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3451">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3452">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3452">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
    <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3524">Numero dea (Drug Enforcement Agency)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3524">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3525">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3525">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3526">due lettere seguite da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3526">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3527">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3527">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3528">Il modello deve includere tutti gli elementi seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3528">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3529">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) da questo set di lettere possibili: abcdefghjklmnprstux, che è un codice registrante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3529">one letter (not case-sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3530">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole), ovvero la prima lettera del cognome o della cifra "9" del dichiarante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3530">one letter (not case-sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3531">sette cifre, l'ultima delle quali è la cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3531">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3532">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3532">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3533">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3533">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3534">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3534">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3535">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3535">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3536">La funzione Func_dea_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3536">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3537">Viene trovata una parola `Keyword_dea_number` chiave da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3537">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3538">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3538">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3539">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3539">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3540">La funzione Func_dea_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3540">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3541">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3541">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3542">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3542">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3543">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3543">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3544">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3544">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3545">dea #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3545">dea#</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3548">Numero di patente di guida estonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3548">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3549">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3549">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3550">due lettere seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3550">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3551">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3551">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3552">due lettere e sei cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3552">two letters and six digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3553">le lettere "ET" (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3553">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3554">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3554">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3555">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3555">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3556">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3556">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3557">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3557">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3558">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3558">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3559">L'espressione  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3559">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3560">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3560">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3686">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3686">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3687">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3687">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3688">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3688">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3689">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3689">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3690">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3690">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3691">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3691">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3692">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3692">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3693">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3693">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3694">11 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3694">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3695">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3695">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3696">11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3696">11 digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3697">una cifra che corrisponde al sesso e al secolo di nascita (numero dispari maschile, numero pari femminile; 1-2: 19° secolo; 3-4: 20° secolo; 5-6: 21° secolo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3697">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3698">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3698">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3699">tre cifre che corrispondono a un numero seriale che separa le persone nate nella stessa data</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3699">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3700">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3700">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3701">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3702">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3702">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3703">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3704">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3704">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3705">La funzione  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3705">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3706">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3706">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3707">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3707">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3708">La funzione  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3708">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3741">Numero di passaporto estone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3741">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3742">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3742">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3743">una lettera seguita da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3743">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3744">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3744">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3745">una lettera seguita da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3745">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3746">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3746">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3747">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3747">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-3748">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3748">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3749">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3749">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3750">L'espressione  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3750">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3751">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3751">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3752">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3752">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-3753">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3753">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3754">L'espressione  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3754">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-3755">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-3755">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
