## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5386">Numero di passaporto della Grecia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5386">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5387">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5388">Due lettere seguite da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5388">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5389">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5390">Due lettere seguite da 7 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5390">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5391">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5391">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5392">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5392">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5393">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5393">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5394">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5394">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5395">L'espressione  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5395">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5396">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5396">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5397">L'espressione regolare trova la data nel formato `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` DD MMM AA (esempio - 28 agosto 19) o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5397">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5398">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5398">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5399">L'espressione  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5399">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5400">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5400">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5416">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5416">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>


## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5417">Grecia - Numero di previdenza sociale (AMKA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5417">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5418">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5418">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5419">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5419">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5420">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5420">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5421">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5421">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5422">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5422">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5423">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5423">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5424">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5424">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5425">11 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5425">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5426">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5426">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5427">Sei cifre come data di nascita AAMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5427">Six digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5428">Quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5428">Four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5429">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5429">a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5430">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5430">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5431">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5431">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5432">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5432">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5433">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5433">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5434">La funzione  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5434">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5435">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5435">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5436">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5436">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5437">La funzione  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5437">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5438">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5438">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5439">Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5439">Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5440">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5440">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5441">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5441">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5442">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5442">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5443">socialsecurityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5443">socialsecurityno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5444">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5444">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5445">amka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5445">amka</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5446">a.m.k.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5446">a.m.k.a.</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5448">Numero di identificazione fiscale della Grecia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5448">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5449">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5449">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5450">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5450">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5451">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5451">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5452">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5452">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5453">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5453">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5454">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5454">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5455">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5455">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5456">Nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5456">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5457">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5457">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5458">9 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5458">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5459">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5459">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5460">Non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5460">Not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5461">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5461">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5462">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5462">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5463">L'espressione  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5463">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5464">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5464">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5493">Numero della carta di identità (HKID) di Hong Kong</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5493">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5494">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5494">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5495">Combinazione di 8-9 lettere e numeri. Facoltativamente, l’ultimo carattere può essere racchiuso tra parentesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5495">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5496">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5496">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5497">Combinazione di 8-9 lettere:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5497">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5498">1-2 lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5498">1-2 letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5499">Sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5499">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5500">L'ultimo carattere (qualsiasi cifra o la lettera A), è rappresentato dal numero di controllo. Facoltativamente, può essere racchiuso tra parentesi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5500">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5501">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5501">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5502">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5502">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5503">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5503">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5504">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5504">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5505">La funzione Func_hong_kong_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5505">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5506">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_hong_kong_id_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5506">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5507">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5507">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5508">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5508">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5509">La funzione Func_hong_kong_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5509">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5510">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5510">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5550">Numero di patente di guida ungherese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5550">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5551">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5551">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5552">Due lettere seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5552">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5553">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5553">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5554">Due lettere e sei cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5554">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5555">Due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5555">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5556">Sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5556">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5557">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5557">Checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5559">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5559">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5560">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5560">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5561">L'espressione  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5561">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5562">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5562">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5693">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5693">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5694">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5694">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5695">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5695">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5696">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5696">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5697">11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5697">11 digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5698">Una cifra che corrisponde al sesso, 1 per il maschio, 2 per la donna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5698">One digit that corresponds to gender, 1 for male, 2 for female.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5699">Altri numeri sono possibili anche per i cittadini nati prima del 1900 o per i cittadini con doppia cittadinanza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5699">Other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5700">Sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5700">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5701">Tre cifre che corrispondono a un numero seriale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5701">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5702">Una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5702">One check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5703">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5703">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5704">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5704">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5705">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5705">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5706">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5706">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5707">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5707">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5708">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5708">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5709">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5709">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5710">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5710">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5721">Numero di passaporto ungherese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5721">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5722">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5722">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5723">Due lettere seguite da sei o sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5723">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5724">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5724">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5725">Due lettere seguite da sei o sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5725">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5726">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5726">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5727">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5727">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5728">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5728">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5729">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5729">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5730">L'espressione  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5730">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5731">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5731">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5732">L'espressione regolare trova la data nel formato `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AA (esempio - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5732">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5733">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5733">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5734">L'espressione  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5734">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5735">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5735">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5755">Codice di previdenza sociale ungherese (TAJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5755">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5756">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5757">Nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5757">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5758">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5759">9 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5759">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5760">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5760">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5761">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5761">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5762">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5762">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5763">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5763">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5764">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5764">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5765">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5765">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5766">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5766">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5767">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5767">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5787">Numero di identificazione fiscale ungherese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5787">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5788">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5788">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5789">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5789">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5790">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5790">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5791">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5791">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5792">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5792">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5793">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5793">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5794">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5794">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5795">10 cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5795">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5796">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5796">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5797">10 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5797">10 digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5798">Una cifra che deve essere "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5798">One digit that must be "8"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5799">Otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5799">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5800">Una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5800">One check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5801">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5801">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5802">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5802">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5803">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5803">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5804">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5804">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5805">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5805">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5806">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5806">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5807">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5807">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5808">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5808">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5834">Numero di imposta sul valore aggiunto dell'Ungheria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5834">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5835">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5835">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5836">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5836">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5837">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5837">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5838">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5838">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5839">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5839">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5840">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5840">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5841">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5841">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5842">Motivo alfanumerico a 10 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5842">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5843">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5843">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5844">Motivo alfanumerico a 10 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5844">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5845">due lettere - HU o hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5845">two letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5846">spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5846">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5847">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5847">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5848">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5848">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5849">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5849">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5850">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5850">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5851">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5851">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5852">La funzione Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5852">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5853">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5853">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5854">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5854">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5855">La funzione Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5855">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5869">India - Numero di account permanente (PAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5869">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5870">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5870">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5871">10 lettere o cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5871">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5872">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5872">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5873">10 lettere o cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5873">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5874">Tre lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5874">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5875">Lettera in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5875">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5876">Una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5876">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5877">Quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5877">Four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5878">Una lettera che è una cifra di controllo alfabetica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5878">A letter that is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5879">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5879">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5880">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5880">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5881">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5881">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5882">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5882">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5883">L'espressione regolare Regex_india_permanent_account_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5883">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5884">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_india_permanent_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5884">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5885">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5885">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5886">L'espressione regolare Regex_india_permanent_account_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5886">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5891">India - Numero di identificazione univoca (Aadhaar)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5891">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5892">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5892">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5893">12 cifre contenenti spazi o trattini facoltativi </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5893">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5894">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5894">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5895">12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5895">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5896">Una cifra che non è 0 o 1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5896">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5897">Tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5897">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5898">Uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5898">An optional space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5899">Quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5899">Four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5900">Uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5900">An optional space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5901">La cifra finale, che è la cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5901">The final digit, which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5902">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5902">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5903">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5903">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5904">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5904">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5905">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5905">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5906">La funzione Func_india_aadhaar trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5906">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5907">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_india_aadhar da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5907">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5908">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5908">The checksum passes.</span></span>
-
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5909">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5909">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5910">La funzione Func_india_aadhaar trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5910">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5911">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5911">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5920">Numero della carta di identità indonesiana (KTP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5920">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5921">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5921">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5922">16 cifre contenenti punti facoltativi </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5922">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5923">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5923">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5924">16 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5924">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5925">Codice provincia a due cifre </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5925">Two-digit province code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5926">Un punto (facoltativo) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5926">A period (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5927">Codice città o area a due cifre </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5927">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5928">Codice sotto-distretto a due cifre </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5928">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5929">Un punto (facoltativo) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5929">A period (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5930">Sei cifre nel formato DDMMYY, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5930">Six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5931">Un punto (facoltativo) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5931">A period (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5932">Quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5932">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5933">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5933">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5934">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5934">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5935">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5935">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5936">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5936">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5937">L'espressione regolare Regex_indonesia_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5937">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5938">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_indonesia_id_card da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5938">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5943">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5943">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span>

## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5944">Numero di conto bancario internazionale (IBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5944">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5945">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5945">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5946">Codice paese (due lettere) più cifre di controllo (due cifre) più numero bban (fino a 30 caratteri)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5946">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-5947">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5947">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-5948">Il modello deve includere tutti gli elementi seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5948">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-5950">Due cifre di controllo (seguite da uno spazio facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-5950">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6024">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6024">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6025">Dizionario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6025">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6026">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6026">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6027">Parola chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6027">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6028">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6028">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6029">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6029">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6030">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6030">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6031">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6031">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6041">Classificazione internazionale delle malattie (ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6041">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6042">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6042">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6043">Dizionario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6043">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6048">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6048">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6049">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6049">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6050">Viene trovata una parola Dictionary_icd_9_updated da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6050">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6051">Viene trovata una parola Dictionary_icd_9_codes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6051">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6052">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6052">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6053">Viene trovata una parola Dictionary_icd_9_updated da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6053">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6054">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6054">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6059">Indirizzo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6059">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6060">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6060">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6061">IPv4:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6061">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6062">Modello complesso che rappresenta le versioni formattate (punti) e non formattate (senza punti) degli indirizzi IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6062">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6063">IPv6:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6063">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6064">Modello complesso che rappresenta i numeri IPv6 formattati (che includono i due punti)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6064">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6065">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6065">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6066">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6066">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6067">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6067">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6068">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6068">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6069">Per IPv6, un criterio DLP ha una probabilità elevata di aver rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6069">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6070">L'espressione regolare Regex_ipv6_address restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6070">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6071">Non vengono trovate parole chiave da Keyword_ipaddress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6071">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6072">Per IPv4, un criterio DLP ha una probabilità elevata di aver rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6072">For IPv4, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6073">L'espressione regolare Regex_ipv4_address restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6073">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6074">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ipaddress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6074">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6075">Per IPv6, un criterio DLP ha una probabilità elevata di aver rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6075">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6076">L'espressione regolare Regex_ipv6_address restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6076">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6077">Non vengono trovate parole chiave da Keyword_ipaddress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6077">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6085">Numero di patente di guida in Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6085">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6086">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6086">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6087">Sei cifre seguite da quattro lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6087">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6088">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6088">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6089">Sei cifre e quattro lettere:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6089">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6090">Sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6090">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6091">Quattro lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6091">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6092">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6092">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6093">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6093">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6094">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6094">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6095">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6095">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6096">L'espressione  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6096">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6221">Numero di passaporto dell'Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6221">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6222">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6222">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6223">Due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6223">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6224">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6224">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6225">Due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6225">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6226">Due cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6226">Two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6227">Sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6227">Seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6228">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6228">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6229">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6229">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6230">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6230">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6231">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6231">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6232">L'espressione  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6232">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6233">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6233">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6234">L'espressione regolare trova la data nel formato `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AAAA (esempio - 01 BEA/MAGGIO 1988) o viene trovata una parola chiave da `Keywords_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6234">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6235">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6235">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6236">L'espressione  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6236">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6237">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6237">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
