## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6261">Numero del servizio pubblico personale (PPS) dell'Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6261">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6262">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6262">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6263">Formato precedente (fino al 31 dicembre 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6263">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6264">sette cifre seguite da 1-2 lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6264">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6265">Nuovo formato (1 gennaio 2013 e dopo):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6265">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6266">sette cifre seguite da due lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6266">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6267">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6267">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6268">Formato precedente (fino al 31 dicembre 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6268">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6269">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6269">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6270">da una a due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6270">one to two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6271">Nuovo formato (1 gennaio 2013 e dopo):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6271">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6272">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6272">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6273">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) che è una cifra di controllo alfabetica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6273">a letter (not case-sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6274">Lettera facoltativa nell'intervallo A-I o "W"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6274">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6275">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6275">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6276">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6276">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6277">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6277">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6278">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6278">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6279">La funzione Func_ireland_pps trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6279">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6280">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6280">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6281">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6281">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6282">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6282">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6283">La funzione Func_ireland_pps trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6283">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6284">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6284">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6329">Numero di conto corrente bancario Israele</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6329">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6330">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6330">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6331">13 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6331">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6332">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6332">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6333">Formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6333">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6334">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6334">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6335">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6335">a dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6336">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6336">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6337">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6337">a dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6338">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6338">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6339">Non formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6339">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6340">13 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6340">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6341">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6342">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6342">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6343">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6344">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6344">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6345">L'espressione regolare Regex_israel_bank_account_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6345">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6346">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_israel_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6346">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6347">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6347">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6348">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6348">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6349">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6349">Bank Account Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6350">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6350">Bank Account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6351">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6351">Account Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6352">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6352">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span>

## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6353">Numero di identificazione nazionale Israele</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6353">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6354">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6354">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6355">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6355">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6356">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6356">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6357">nove cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6357">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6358">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6358">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6359">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6359">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6360">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6360">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6361">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6361">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6362">La funzione Func_israeli_national_id_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6362">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6363">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_Israel_National_ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6363">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6364">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6364">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6365">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6365">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6366">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6366">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6367">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6367">מספר זהות</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6369">מספר זיהוי ישר אלי</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6369">מספר זיהוי ישר אלי</span></span>      
-   <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6370">זהותישר אלית</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6370">זהותישר אלית</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6371">هو ية اسرائيل ية عدد</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6371">هو ية اسرائيل ية عدد</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6372">هوية إسرائ يلية</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6372">هوية إسرائ يلية</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6373">رقم الهوية</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6373">رقم الهوية</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6374">عدد هوية فريدة من نوعها</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6374">عدد هوية فريدة من نوعها</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6375">idnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6375">idnumber#</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6376">id number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6376">id number</span></span>

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6383">Numero di patente di guida italiana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6383">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6384">Questa entità di tipo è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate numero di patente ue.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6384">This type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6385">È inoltre disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6385">It is also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6386">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6386">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6387">una combinazione di 10 lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6387">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6388">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6388">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6389">una combinazione di 10 lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6389">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6390">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6390">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6391">la lettera "A" o "V" (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6391">the letter "A" or "V" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6392">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6392">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6393">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6393">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6394">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6394">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6395">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6395">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6396">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6396">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6397">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6397">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6398">L'espressione `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6398">The regular expression `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6399">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6399">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
    <Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6526">Codice fiscale italiano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6526">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6527">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6527">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6528">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6528">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6529">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6529">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6530">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6530">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6531">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6531">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6532">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6532">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6533">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6533">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6534">una combinazione di 16 caratteri di lettere e cifre nel modello specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6534">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6535">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6535">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6536">Una combinazione di 16 caratteri di lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6536">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6537">tre lettere che corrispondono alle prime tre consonanti nel nome della famiglia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6537">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6538">tre lettere che corrispondono alla prima, alla terza e alla quarta consonanti nel nome</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6538">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6539">due cifre che corrispondono alle ultime cifre dell'anno di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6539">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6540">una lettera che corrisponde alla lettera del mese di nascita: le lettere vengono utilizzate in ordine alfabetico, ma vengono utilizzate solo le lettere da A a E, H, L, M, P, R a T (quindi, gennaio è A e ottobre è R)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6540">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (so, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6541">due cifre che corrispondono al giorno del mese di nascita per distinguere i generi, 40 viene aggiunto al giorno di nascita per le donne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6541">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6542">quattro cifre che corrispondono al codice di area specifico del comune in cui è nata la persona (i codici a livello nazionale vengono utilizzati per i paesi esterni)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6542">four digits that correspond to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6543">una cifra di parità</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6543">one parity digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6544">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6544">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6545">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6545">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6546">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6546">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6547">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6547">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6548">La funzione  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6548">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6549">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6549">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6550">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6550">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6551">La funzione  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6551">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6586">Numero di passaporto italiano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6586">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6587">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6587">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6588">due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6588">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6589">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6589">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6590">due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6590">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6591">due cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6591">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6592">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6592">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6593">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6593">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6594">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6594">not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6595">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6595">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6596">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6596">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6597">L'espressione  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6597">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6598">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6598">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6599">L'espressione regolare trova la data nel formato `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AAAA (esempio - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6599">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6600">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6600">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6601">L'espressione  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6601">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6602">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6602">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6626">Numero di imposta sul valore aggiunto dell'Italia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6626">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6627">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6627">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6628">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6628">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6629">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6629">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6630">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6630">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6631">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6631">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6632">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6632">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6633">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6633">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6634">Motivo alfanumerico a 13 caratteri con delimitatori facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6634">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6635">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6635">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6636">Motivo alfanumerico a 13 caratteri con delimitatori facoltativi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6636">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6637">I o i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6637">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6638">T o t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6638">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6639">spazio facoltativo, punto, trattino o virgola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6639">optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6640">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6640">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6641">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6641">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6642">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6642">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6643">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6643">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6644">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6644">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6645">La funzione Func_italy_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6645">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6646">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number dall'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6646">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6647">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6647">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6648">La funzione Func_italy_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6648">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6656">Numero di conto corrente bancario giappone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6656">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6657">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6657">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6658">sette o otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6658">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6659">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6659">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6660">numero di conto corrente bancario:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6660">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6661">sette o otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6661">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6662">codice filiale del conto corrente bancario:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6662">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6663">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6663">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6664">uno spazio o un trattino (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6664">a space or dash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6665">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6665">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6666">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6666">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6667">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6667">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6668">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6668">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6669">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6669">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6670">La funzione Func_jp_bank_account restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6670">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6671">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_bank_account.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6671">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6672">Si verifica una delle situazioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6672">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6673">La funzione Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6673">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6674">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6674">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6675">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6675">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6676">La funzione Func_jp_bank_account restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6676">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6677">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_bank_account.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6677">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6724">Numero di patente di guida giapponese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6724">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6725">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6725">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6726">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6726">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6727">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6727">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6728">12 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6728">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6729">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6729">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6730">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6730">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6731">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6731">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6732">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6732">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6733">La funzione Func_jp_drivers_license_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6733">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6734">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6734">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6735">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6735">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6736">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6736">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6737">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6737">driverlicense</span></span>

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6772">Giappone Il mio numero - Corporate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6772">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6773">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6773">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6774">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6774">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6775">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6775">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6776">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6776">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6777">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6777">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6778">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6778">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6779">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6780">Numero a 13 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6780">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6781">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6782">Numero a 13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6782">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6783">una cifra da una a nove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6783">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6784">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6784">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6785">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6785">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6786">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6786">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6787">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6787">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6788">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6788">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6789">La funzione Func_japanese_my_number_corporate trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6789">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6790">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6790">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6791">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6791">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6792">La funzione Func_japanese_my_number_corporate trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6792">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6807">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6807">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6808">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6808">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6809">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6809">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6810">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6810">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6811">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6811">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6812">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6812">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6818">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6818">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6819">uno spazio facoltativo, un punto o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6819">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6820">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6820">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6821">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6821">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6822">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6822">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6823">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6823">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6824">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6824">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6825">La funzione Func_japanese_my_number_personal trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6825">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6826">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6826">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6827">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6827">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6828">La funzione Func_japanese_my_number_personal trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6828">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6841">Numero di passaporto giappone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6841">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6842">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6842">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6843">due lettere seguite da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6843">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6844">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6844">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6845">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) seguite da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6845">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6846">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6846">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6847">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6847">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6848">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6848">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6849">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6849">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6850">La funzione Func_jp_passport restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6850">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6851">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_passport.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6851">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6868">Numero di carta di residenza giappone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6868">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6869">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6869">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6870">12 lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6870">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6871">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6871">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6872">12 lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6872">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6873">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6873">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6874">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6874">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6875">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6875">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6876">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6876">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6877">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6877">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6878">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6878">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6879">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6879">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6880">L'espressione regolare Regex_jp_residence_card_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6880">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6881">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_jp_residence_card_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6881">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6890">Numero di registrazione residente in Giappone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6890">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6891">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6891">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6892">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6892">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6893">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6893">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6894">11 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6894">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6896">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6896">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6897">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6897">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6898">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6898">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6899">La funzione Func_jp_resident_registration_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6899">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6900">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6900">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6913">Giappone - Numero di previdenza sociale (SIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6913">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6914">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6914">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6915">7-12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6915">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6916">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6916">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6917">7-12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6917">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6918">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6918">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6919">un trattino (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6919">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6920">sei cifre OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6920">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6921">7-12 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6921">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6922">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6922">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6923">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6923">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6924">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6924">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6925">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6925">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6926">La funzione Func_jp_sin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6926">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6927">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_sin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6927">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6928">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6928">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6929">La funzione Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6929">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6930">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_sin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6930">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6951">Numero di patente lettone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6951">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6952">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6952">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6953">tre lettere seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6953">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6954">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6954">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6955">tre lettere e sei cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6955">three letters and six digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6956">tre lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6956">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6957">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6957">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6958">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6958">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6959">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6959">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-6960">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6960">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-6961">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6961">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6962">L'espressione  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6962">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-6963">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-6963">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7088">Codice personale Lettone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7088">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7089">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7089">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7090">11 cifre e un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7090">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7091">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7091">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7092">Formato precedente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7092">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7093">11 cifre e un trattino:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7093">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7094">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7094">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7095">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7095">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7096">una cifra che corrisponde al secolo di nascita ("0" per il 19° secolo, "1" per il 20° secolo e "2" per il 21° secolo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7096">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7097">quattro cifre generate in modo casuale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7097">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7098">Nuovo formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7098">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7099">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7099">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7100">Due cifre "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7100">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7101">9 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7101">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7102">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7102">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7103">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7103">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7104">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7104">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7105">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7105">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7106">La funzione  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` o l'espressione regolare `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7106">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7107">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7107">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7108">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7108">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7109">La funzione  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` o l'espressione regolare `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7109">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7172">Numero di passaporto lettone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7172">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7173">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7173">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7174">due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7174">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7175">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7175">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7176">due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7176">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7177">due cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7177">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7178">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7178">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7179">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7179">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7180">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7180">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7181">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7181">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7182">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7182">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7183">L'espressione  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7183">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7184">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7184">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7185">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7185">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7186">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7187">L'espressione  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7187">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7188">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7188">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
