## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7211">Numero di patente di guida lituania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7211">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7212">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7212">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7213">otto cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7213">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7214">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7214">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7215">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7215">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7216">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7216">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7217">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7217">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7218">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7218">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7219">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7219">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7220">L'espressione  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7220">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7221">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7221">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7353">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7353">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7354">11 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7354">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7355">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7355">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7356">11 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7356">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7357">una cifra (da 1 a 6) che corrisponde al sesso e al secolo di nascita della persona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7357">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7358">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7358">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7359">tre cifre che corrispondono al numero seriale della data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7359">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7360">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7360">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7361">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7361">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7362">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7362">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7363">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7363">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7364">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7364">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7365">La funzione  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7365">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7366">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7366">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7367">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7367">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7368">La funzione  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7368">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7403">Numero di passaporto lituania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7403">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7404">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7405">otto cifre o lettere senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7405">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7406">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7407">otto cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7407">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7408">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7408">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7409">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7409">not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7410">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7410">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7411">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7411">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7412">L'espressione  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7412">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7413">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7413">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7414">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date3` regolare trova la data nel formato GG MM AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7414">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7415">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7415">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7416">L'espressione  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7416">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7417">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7417">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7437">Numero di patente di guida di Luxemburg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7437">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7438">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7438">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7439">sei cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7439">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7440">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7440">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7441">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7441">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7442">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7442">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7443">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7443">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7444">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7444">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7445">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7445">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7446">L'espressione  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7446">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7447">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7447">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7569">fahrerlaubnis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7569">fahrerlaubnis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7570">Führerschäin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7570">Führerschäin</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7571">Numero di identificazione nazionale di Lussemburgo (persone fisiche)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7571">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7572">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7572">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7573">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7573">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7574">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7574">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7575">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7575">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7576">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7576">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7577">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7577">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7578">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7578">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7579">13 cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7579">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7580">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7580">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7581">13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7581">13 digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7582">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7582">11 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7583">due cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7583">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7584">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7584">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7585">sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7585">yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7586">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7586">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7587">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7587">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7588">La funzione  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7588">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7589">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7589">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7590">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7590">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7591">La funzione  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7591">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7614">Numero di passaporto di Luxemburg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7614">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7615">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7615">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7616">otto cifre o lettere senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7616">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7617">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7617">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7618">otto cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7618">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7619">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7619">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7620">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7620">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7621">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7621">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7622">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7622">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7623">L'espressione  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7623">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7624">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7624">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7625">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date3` regolare trova la data nel formato GG MM AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7625">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7626">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7626">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7627">L'espressione  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7627">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7628">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7628">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7660">Numero di identificazione nazionale di Luxemburg (persone non naturali)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7660">Luxemburg national identification number (non-natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7661">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7662">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7662">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7663">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7664">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7664">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7665">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7665">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7666">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7666">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7667">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7667">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7668">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7668">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7669">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7669">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7670">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7670">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7671">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7671">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7672">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7672">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7673">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7673">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7674">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7674">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7675">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7675">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7676">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7676">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7677">La funzione  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7677">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7678">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7678">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7679">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7679">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7680">La funzione  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7680">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7720">Numero di carta di identità malese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7720">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7721">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7721">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7722">12 cifre contenenti lineette facoltative</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7722">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7723">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7723">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7724">12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7724">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7725">sei cifre nel formato AAMMDD, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7725">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7726">un trattino (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7726">a dash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7727">Codice luogo di nascita a due lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7727">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7728">un trattino (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7728">a dash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7729">tre cifre casuali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7729">three random digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7730">codice di genere a una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7730">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7731">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7731">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7732">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7732">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7733">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7733">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7734">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7734">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7735">L'espressione regolare Regex_malaysia_id_card_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7735">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7736">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7736">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7763">Numero di patente di guida di Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7763">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7764">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7765">Combinazione di due caratteri e sei cifre nel formato specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7765">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7766">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7767">combinazione di due caratteri e sei cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7767">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7768">due caratteri (cifre o lettere, senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7768">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7769">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7769">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7770">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7770">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7771">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7771">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7772">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7772">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7773">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7774">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7774">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7775">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7776">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7776">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7777">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7777">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7778">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7778">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7902">Numero di carta d'identità di Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7902">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7903">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7903">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7904">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7904">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7905">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7905">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7906">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7906">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7907">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7907">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7908">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7908">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7909">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7909">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7910">sette cifre seguite da una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7910">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7911">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7911">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7912">sette cifre seguite da una lettera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7912">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7913">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7913">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7914">una lettera in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7914">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7915">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7915">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7916">Non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7916">Not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7917">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7917">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7918">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7918">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7919">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7919">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7920">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7920">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7921">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7921">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7922">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7922">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7939">Numero di passaporto di Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7939">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7940">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7940">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7941">sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7941">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7942">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7942">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7943">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7943">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7944">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7945">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7945">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7946">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7947">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7947">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7948">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7948">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7949">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7949">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7950">Viene trovata una parola `Keywords_eu_passport_date` chiave da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7950">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7951">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7951">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7952">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7952">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7953">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7953">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7973">Numero di identificazione fiscale di Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7973">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7974">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7974">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7975">Per i cittadini maltesi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7975">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7976">sette cifre e una lettera nello schema specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7976">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7977">Nazionali non maltesi ed entità maltesi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7977">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7978">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7978">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7979">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7979">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7980">Nazionali maltesi: sette cifre e una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7980">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7981">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7981">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7982">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7982">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7983">Nazionali non maltesi ed entità maltesi: nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7983">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7984">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7984">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7985">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7985">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7986">Non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7986">Not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-7987">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7987">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7988">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7988">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7989">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  regolare o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7989">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7990">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7990">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-7991">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7991">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-7992">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` regolare o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-7992">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="medicare-beneficiary-identifier-mbi-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8025">Carta MBI (Medicare Beneficiary Identifier)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8025">Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8026">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8026">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8027">Motivo alfanumerico a 11 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8027">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8028">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8028">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8029">una cifra compresa tra 1 e 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8029">one digit between 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8030">una lettera esclusa S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8030">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8031">una cifra o una lettera esclusa S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8031">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8032">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8032">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8033">un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8033">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8034">una lettera esclusa S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8034">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8035">una cifra o una lettera esclusa S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8035">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8036">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8036">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8037">un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8037">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8038">due lettere escluse S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8038">two letters excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8039">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8039">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8040">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8040">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8041">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8041">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8042">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8042">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8043">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8043">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8044">L'espressione  `Regex_mbi_card` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8044">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8045">Viene trovata una parola  `Keyword_mbi_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8045">A keyword from  `Keyword_mbi_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8046">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8046">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8047">L'espressione  `Regex_mbi_card` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8047">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card -->
      <Entity id="f753a286-f5cc-47e6-a592-4be25fd02591" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8048">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8048">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_mbi_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8049">Keyword_mbi_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8049">Keyword_mbi_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8050">mbi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8050">mbi</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8052">medicare beneficiario #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8052">medicare beneficiary #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8053">identificatore del beneficiario medicare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8053">medicare beneficiary identifier</span></span>

## <a name="mexico-unique-population-registry-code-curp"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8057">Codice CURP (Unique Population Registry Code) del Messico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8057">Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8058">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8058">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8059">Motivo alfanumerico a 18 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8059">18 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8060">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8060">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8061">quattro lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8061">four letters (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8062">sei cifre che indicano una data valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8062">six digits indicating a valid date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8063">una lettera - H/h o M/m</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8063">a letter - H/h or M/m</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8064">due lettere che indicano un codice di stato messicano valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8064">two letters indicating a valid Mexican state code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8065">tre lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8065">three letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8066">una lettera o una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8066">one letter or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8067">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8067">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8068">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8068">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8069">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8069">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8070">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8070">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8071">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8071">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8072">La funzione  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8072">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8073">Viene trovata una parola  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8073">A keyword from  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8074">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8074">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8075">La funzione  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8075">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP) -->
      <Entity id="e905ad4d-5a74-406d-bf36-b1efca798af4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8096">Numero BSN (Netherlands citizen's service)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8096">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8097">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8097">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8098">otto o nove cifre contenenti spazi facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8098">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8099">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8099">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8100">otto-nove cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8100">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8101">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8101">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8102">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8102">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8103">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8103">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8104">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8104">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8105">due-tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8105">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8106">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8106">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8107">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8107">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8108">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8108">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8109">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8109">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8110">La funzione Func_netherlands_bsn trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8110">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8111">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_netherlands_bsn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8111">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8112">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8112">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8136">Numero di patente olandese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8136">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8137">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8137">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8138">10 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8138">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8139">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8139">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8140">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8140">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8141">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8141">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8142">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8142">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8143">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8143">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8144">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8144">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8145">L'espressione  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8145">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8146">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8146">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8274">Numero di passaporto olandese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8274">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8275">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8275">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8276">nove lettere o cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8276">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8277">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8277">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8278">nove lettere o cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8278">nine letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8279">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8279">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8280">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8280">not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8281">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8281">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8282">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8282">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8283">L'espressione  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8283">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8284">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8284">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8285">L'espressione regolare trova la data nel formato `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AAAA (esempio - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8285">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8286">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8286">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8287">L'espressione  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8287">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8288">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8288">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8307">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8307">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8308">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8308">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8313">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8313">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8315">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8315">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8316">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8316">nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8320">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8320">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8323">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8323">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8362">Numero di imposta sul valore aggiunto dei Paesi Bassi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8362">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8363">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8363">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8364">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8364">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8365">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8365">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8366">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8366">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8367">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8367">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8368">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8368">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8369">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8369">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8370">Motivo alfanumerico a 14 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8370">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8371">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8371">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8372">Motivo alfanumerico a 14 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8372">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8373">N o n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8373">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8374">L o l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8374">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8375">spazio facoltativo, punto o trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8375">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8376">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8376">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8377">spazio facoltativo, punto o trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8377">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8378">B o b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8378">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8379">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8379">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8380">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8381">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8381">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8382">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8382">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8383">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8383">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8384">La funzione Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8384">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8385">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8385">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8386">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8386">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8387">La funzione Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8387">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8406">Motivo da 14 a 16 cifre con delimitatore facoltativo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8406">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>
