<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8431">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8431">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8432">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8432">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8433">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8433">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8434">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8434">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8435">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8435">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8436">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8436">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8437">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8437">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8438">schema alfanumerico a otto caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8438">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8439">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8439">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8440">schema alfanumerico a otto caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8440">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8441">due lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8441">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8442">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8442">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8443">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8444">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8444">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8445">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8446">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8446">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8447">La funzione Func_newzealand_driver_license_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8447">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8448">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8448">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8449">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8449">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8450">La funzione Func_newzealand_driver_license_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8450">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8517">New Zealand inland revenue number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8517">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8518">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8518">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8519">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8519">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8520">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8520">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8521">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8521">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8522">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8522">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8523">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8523">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8524">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8524">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8525">otto o nove cifre con delimitatori facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8525">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8526">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8526">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8527">otto o nove cifre con delimitatori facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8527">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8528">due o tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8528">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8529">uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8529">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8530">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8530">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8531">uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8531">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8532">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8532">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8533">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8533">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8534">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8534">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8535">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8535">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8536">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8536">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8537">La funzione Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8537">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8538">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8538">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8539">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8539">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8540">La funzione Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8540">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8549">Numero del ministero della sanità della Nuova Zelanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8549">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8550">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8550">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8551">tre lettere, uno spazio (facoltativo) e quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8551">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8552">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8552">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8553">tre lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) tranne "I" e "O"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8553">three letters (not case-sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8554">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8554">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8555">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8555">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8556">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8556">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8557">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8557">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8558">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8558">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8559">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8559">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8560">La funzione Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8560">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8561">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_nz_terms.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8561">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8562">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8562">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8563">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8563">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8564">La funzione Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8564">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8565">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8565">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8579">Numero di previdenza sociale neozelandese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8579">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8580">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8580">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8581">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8581">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8582">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8582">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8583">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8583">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8584">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8584">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8585">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8585">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8586">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8586">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8587">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8587">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8588">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8588">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8589">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8589">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8590">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8590">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8591">un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8591">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8592">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8592">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8593">un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8593">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8594">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8594">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8595">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8595">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8596">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8596">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8597">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8597">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8598">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8598">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8599">La funzione Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8599">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8600">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8600">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8601">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8601">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8602">La funzione Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8602">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8610">Numero di identificazione norvegia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8610">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8611">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8611">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8612">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8612">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8613">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8613">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8614">11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8614">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8615">sei cifre nel formato DDMMYY, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8615">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8616">numero individuale a tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8616">three-digit individual number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8617">due cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8617">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8618">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8618">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8619">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8619">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8620">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8620">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8621">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8621">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8622">La funzione Func_norway_id_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8622">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8623">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_norway_id_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8623">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8624">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8624">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8625">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8625">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8626">La funzione Func_norway_id_numbe trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8626">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8627">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8627">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8629">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8629">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8632">ID Number</span></span>

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8636">Numero di identificazione multivalore unificato delle Filippine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8636">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8637">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8637">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8638">12 cifre separate da dei segni meno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8638">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8639">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8639">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8640">12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8640">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8641">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8641">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8642">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8642">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8643">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8643">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8644">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8644">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8645">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8645">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8646">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8646">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8647">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8647">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8648">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8648">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8649">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8649">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8650">L'espressione regolare Regex_philippines_unified_id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8650">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8651">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_philippines_id da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8651">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8655">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8655">UMID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8658">Numero di patente di guida polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8658">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8659">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8659">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8660">14 cifre contenenti due barre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8660">14 digits containing two forward slashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8661">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8661">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8662">14 cifre e due barre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8662">14 digits and two forward slashes:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8663">cinque cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8663">five digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8664">una barra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8664">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8665">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8665">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8666">una barra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8666">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8667">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8667">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8668">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8669">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8669">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8670">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8671">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8671">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8672">L'espressione  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8672">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8673">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8673">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8797">Carta di identità polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8797">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8798">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8798">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8799">tre lettere e sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8799">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8800">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8800">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8801">tre lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8801">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8802">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8802">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8803">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8803">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8804">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8804">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8805">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8805">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8806">La funzione Func_polish_national_id restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8806">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8807">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8807">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8808">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8808">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8819">ID nazionale Polonia (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8819">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8820">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8820">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8821">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8821">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8822">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8822">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8823">sei cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita nel formato AAMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8823">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8824">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8824">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8825">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8825">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8826">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8826">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8827">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8827">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8828">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8828">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8829">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8829">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8830">La funzione Func_pesel_identification_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8830">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8831">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_pesel_identification_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8831">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8832">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8832">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8833">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8833">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8834">La funzione Func_pesel_identification_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8834">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8835">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8835">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8847">Numero di passaporto polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8847">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8848">Questa entità tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate Numero di passaporto UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8848">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8849">È disponibile anche come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8849">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8850">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8850">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8851">due lettere e sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8851">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8852">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8852">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8853">Due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) seguite da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8853">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8854">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8854">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8855">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8855">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8856">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8856">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8857">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8857">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8858">La funzione `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8858">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8859">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8859">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8860">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8860">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8861">Viene trovata una parola `Keywords_eu_passport_date` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8861">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8862">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8862">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8863">La funzione `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8863">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8864">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8864">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8865">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8865">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8866">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8866">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8867">La funzione `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8867">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8868">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8868">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8895">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8895">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8909">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8909">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8910">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8910">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8911">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8911">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8912">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8912">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8913">La funzione Func_polish_regon_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8913">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8914">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keywords_polish_regon_number'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8914">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8915">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8915">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8916">La funzione Func_polish_regon_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8916">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8933">Numero di identificazione fiscale polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8933">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8934">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8934">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8935">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8935">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8936">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8936">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8937">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8937">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8938">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8938">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8939">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8939">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8940">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8940">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8941">11 cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8941">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8942">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8942">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8943">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8943">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8944">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8945">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8945">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8946">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8947">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8947">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8948">La funzione  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8948">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8949">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8949">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8979">Numero di carta di cittadinanza portoghese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8979">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8980">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8980">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8981">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8981">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8982">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8982">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8983">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8983">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8984">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8984">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8985">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8985">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-8986">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8986">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-8987">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8987">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8988">L'espressione regolare Regex_portugal_citizen_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8988">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-8989">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_portugal_citizen_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-8989">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml

<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9009">Numero di patente di guida portoghese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9009">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9010">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9010">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9011">due modelli - due lettere seguite da 5-8 cifre con caratteri speciali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9011">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9012">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9012">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9013">Modello 1: due lettere seguite da 5/6 con caratteri speciali:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9013">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9014">Due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9014">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9015">Una lineetta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9015">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9016">Cinque o sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9016">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9017">Uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9017">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9018">Una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9018">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9019">Modello 2: una lettera seguita da 6/8 cifre con caratteri speciali:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9019">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9020">Una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9020">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9021">Una lineetta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9021">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9022">Sei o otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9022">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9023">Uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9023">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9024">Una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9024">One digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9025">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9025">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9026">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9026">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9027">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9027">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9028">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9028">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9029">L'espressione  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9029">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9030">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9030">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9162">Numero di passaporto portoghese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9162">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9163">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9164">una lettera seguita da sei cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9164">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9165">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9166">una lettera seguita da sei cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9166">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9167">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9167">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9168">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9168">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9169">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9169">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9170">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9170">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9171">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9171">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9172">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9172">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9173">L'espressione  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9173">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9174">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9174">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9175">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9175">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9176">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9176">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9177">L'espressione  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9177">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9178">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9178">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9205">Numero di identificazione fiscale del Portogallo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9205">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9206">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9206">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9207">nove cifre con spazi facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9207">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9208">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9208">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9209">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9209">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9210">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9210">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9211">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9211">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9212">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9212">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9213">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9213">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9214">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9215">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9215">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9216">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9217">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9217">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9218">La funzione  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9218">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9219">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9219">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9220">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9220">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9221">La funzione  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9221">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9246">Numero di patente di guida romania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9246">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9247">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9247">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9248">un carattere seguito da otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9248">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9249">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9249">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9250">un carattere seguito da otto cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9250">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9251">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) o una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9251">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9252">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9252">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9253">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9253">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9254">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9254">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9255">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9255">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9256">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9256">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9257">L'espressione  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9257">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9258">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9258">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9386">Codice numerico personale Romania (CNP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9386">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9387">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9387">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9388">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9388">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9389">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9389">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9390">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9390">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9391">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9391">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9392">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9392">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9393">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9393">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9394">13 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9394">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9395">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9395">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9396">una cifra da 1 a 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9396">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9397">sei cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9397">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9398">due cifre, che possono essere 01-52 o 99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9398">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9399">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9399">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9400">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9400">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9401">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9401">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9402">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9402">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9403">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9403">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9404">La funzione  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9404">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9405">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9405">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9406">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9406">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9407">La funzione  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9407">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9458">Numero di passaporto romania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9458">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9459">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9459">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9460">otto o nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9460">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9461">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9461">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9462">otto o nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9462">eight or nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9463">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9463">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9464">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9464">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9465">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9465">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9466">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9466">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9467">L'espressione  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9467">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9468">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9468">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9469">L'espressione regolare trova la data nel formato `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AA (esempio- 01 FEB/FEB 10) o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9469">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9470">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9470">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9471">L'espressione  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9471">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9472">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9472">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9490">Russia - Numero di passaporto nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9490">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9491">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9491">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9492">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9492">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9495">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9495">records management</span></span>
