### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9497">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9497">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9498">Numero a 10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9498">10-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9499">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9499">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9500">Numero a 10 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9500">10-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9501">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9501">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9502">uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9502">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9503">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9503">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9504">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9504">an optional space</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9507">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9507">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9508">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9508">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9509">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9509">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9510">L'espressione Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9510">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9511">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9511">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />

      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9535">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9535">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9546">L'espressione Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9546">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9564">Arabia Saudita - Identificativo nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9564">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9565">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9565">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9566">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9566">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9567">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9567">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9568">10 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9568">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9569">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9569">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9570">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9570">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9571">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9571">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9572">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9572">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9573">L'espressione regolare Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9573">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9574">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9574">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9581">Numero NRIC (National Registration Identity Card) di Singapore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9581">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9582">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9582">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9583">nove lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9583">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9584">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9584">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9585">nove lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9585">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9586">la lettera "F", "G", "S" o "T" (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9586">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9587">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9587">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9588">una cifra di controllo alfabetica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9588">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9589">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9589">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9590">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9590">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9591">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9591">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9592">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9592">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9593">L'espressione regolare Regex_singapore_nric trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9593">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9594">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_singapore_nric.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9594">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9595">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9595">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9596">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9596">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9597">L'espressione regolare Regex_singapore_nric trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9597">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9598">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9598">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9609">Numero di patente di guida slovacchia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9609">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9610">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9610">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9611">un carattere seguito da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9611">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9612">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9612">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9613">un carattere seguito da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9613">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9614">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) o una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9614">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9615">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9615">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9616">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9616">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9617">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9617">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9618">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9618">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9619">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9619">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9620">L'espressione  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9620">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9621">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9621">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9747">Numero personale Slovacchia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9747">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9748">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9748">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9749">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9749">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9750">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9750">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9751">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9751">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9752">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9752">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9753">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9753">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9754">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9754">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9755">nove o 10 cifre contenenti barra rovesciata facoltativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9755">nine or 10 digits containing optional backslash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9756">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9756">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9757">sei cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9757">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9758">barra facoltativa (/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9758">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9759">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9759">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9760">una cifra di controllo facoltativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9760">one optional check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9761">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9761">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9762">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9762">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9763">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9763">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9764">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9764">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9765">La funzione  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9765">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9766">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9766">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9767">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9767">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9768">La funzione  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9768">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9771">azonosító szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9771">azonosító szám</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9815">Numero di passaporto slovacchia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9815">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9816">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9816">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9817">una cifra o una lettera seguita da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9817">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9818">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9818">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9819">una cifra o una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) seguita da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9819">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9820">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9820">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9821">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9821">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9822">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9822">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9823">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9823">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9824">L'espressione  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9824">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9825">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9825">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9826">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9826">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9827">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9827">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9828">L'espressione  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9828">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9829">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9829">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9851">Numero di patente di guida slovena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9851">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9852">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9852">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9853">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9853">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9854">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9854">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9855">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9855">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9856">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9856">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9857">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9857">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9858">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9858">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9859">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9859">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9860">L'espressione  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9860">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9861">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9861">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9988">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9988">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9989">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9989">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9990">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9990">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9991">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9991">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9992">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9992">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9993">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9993">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9994">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9994">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9995">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9995">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9996">13 cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9996">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-9997">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9997">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-9998">13 cifre nel modello specificato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9998">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-9999">sette cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (DDMMLLL), dove "LLL" corrisponde alle ultime tre cifre dell'anno di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-9999">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10000">due cifre che corrispondono all'area di nascita "50"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10000">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10001">tre cifre che corrispondono a una combinazione di sesso e numero di serie per le persone nate nello stesso giorno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10001">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10002">000-499 per gli uomini e 500-999 per le femmine.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10002">000-499 for male and 500-999 for female.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10003">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10003">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10004">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10004">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10005">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10005">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10006">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10006">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10007">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10007">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10008">La funzione  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10008">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10009">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10009">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10010">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10010">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10011">La funzione  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10011">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10039">Numero di passaporto slovenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10039">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10040">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10040">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10041">due lettere seguite da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10041">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10042">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10042">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10043">due lettere seguite da sette cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10043">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10044">la lettera "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10044">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10045">una lettera maiuscola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10045">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10046">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10046">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10047">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10047">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10048">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10048">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10049">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10049">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10050">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10050">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10051">L'espressione  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10051">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10052">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10052">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10053">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10053">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10054">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10054">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10055">L'espressione  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10055">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10056">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10056">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10079">Numero di identificazione fiscale Slovenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10079">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10080">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10080">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10081">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10081">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10082">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10082">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10083">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10083">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10084">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10084">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10085">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10085">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10086">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10086">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10087">otto cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10087">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10088">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10088">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10089">una cifra da 1 a 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10089">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10090">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10090">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10091">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10091">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10092">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10092">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10093">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10093">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10094">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10094">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10095">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10095">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10096">La funzione  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10096">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10097">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10097">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10098">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10098">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10099">La funzione  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10099">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10123">Numero di identificazione sudafricano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10123">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10124">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10124">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10125">13 cifre che possono contenere spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10125">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10126">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10126">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10127">13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10127">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10128">sei cifre nel formato AAMMDD, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10128">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10129">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10129">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10130">indicatore di cittadinanza a una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10130">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10131">la cifra "8" o "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10131">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10132">una cifra, ovvero una cifra di checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10132">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10133">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10133">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10134">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10134">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10135">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10135">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10136">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10136">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10137">La funzione Func_south_africa_identification_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10137">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10138">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_south_africa_identification_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10138">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10139">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10139">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10145">South Korea resident registration number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10145">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10146">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10146">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10147">13 cifre contenenti un segno meno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10147">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10148">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10148">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10149">13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10149">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10150">sei cifre nel formato AAMMDD, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10150">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10151">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10151">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10152">una cifra determinata dal secolo e dal sesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10152">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10153">Codice paese di nascita a quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10153">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10154">una cifra utilizzata per distinguere le persone per le quali i numeri precedenti sono identici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10154">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10155">una cifra di controllo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10155">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10156">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10156">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10157">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10157">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10158">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10158">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10159">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10159">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10160">La funzione Func_south_korea_resident_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10160">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10161">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keyword_south_korea_resident_number'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10161">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10162">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10162">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10163">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10163">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10164">La funzione Func_south_korea_resident_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10164">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10165">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10165">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10173">Numero di patente di guida in Spagna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10173">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10174">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10175">otto cifre seguite da un carattere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10175">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10176">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10177">otto cifre seguite da un carattere:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10177">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10178">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10178">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10179">una cifra o una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10179">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10180">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10181">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10181">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10182">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10183">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10183">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10184">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10184">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10185">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10185">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10186">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10187">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10187">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10321">Spagna DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10321">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10322">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10322">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10323">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10323">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10324">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10324">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10325">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10325">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10326">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10326">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10327">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10327">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10328">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10328">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10329">otto cifre seguite da un carattere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10329">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10330">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10330">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10331">sette cifre seguite da un carattere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10331">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10332">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10332">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10333">Uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10333">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10334">una lettera di controllo (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10334">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10335">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10335">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10336">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10336">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10337">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10337">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10338">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10338">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10339">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10339">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10340">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10340">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10341">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10341">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10342">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10342">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10366">Numero di passaporto spagnolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10366">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10367">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10367">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10368">una combinazione di otto o nove caratteri di lettere e numeri senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10368">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10369">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10369">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10370">una combinazione di otto o nove caratteri di lettere e numeri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10370">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10371">due cifre o lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10371">two digits or letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10372">una cifra o una lettera (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10372">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10373">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10373">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10374">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10374">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10375">Non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10375">Not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10376">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10376">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10377">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10377">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10378">L'espressione  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10378">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10379">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10379">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10380">L'espressione `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` regolare trova la data nel formato GG-MM-AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10380">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10381">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10381">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10382">L'espressione  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10382">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10383">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10383">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10412">Spagna - Numero di previdenza sociale (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10412">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10413">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10414">11-12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10414">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10415">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10415">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10416">11-12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10416">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10417">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10417">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10418">una barra (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10418">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10419">da sette a otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10419">seven to eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10420">una barra (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10420">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10421">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10421">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10422">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10422">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10423">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10423">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10424">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10424">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10425">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10425">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10426">La funzione Func_spanish_social_security_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10426">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10427">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10427">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- - <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10428">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10428">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10429">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10429">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10430">La funzione Func_spanish_social_security_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10430">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10431">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10431">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Spain SSN -->
    <Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10433">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10433">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10440">Numero di identificazione fiscale spagna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10440">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10441">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10441">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10442">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10442">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10443">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10443">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10444">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10444">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10445">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10445">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10446">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10446">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10447">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10448">sette o otto cifre e una o due lettere nel modello specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10448">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10449">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10449">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10450">Spagnolo Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10450">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10451">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10451">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10452">una lettera maiuscola (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10452">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10453">Spagnoli non residenti senza carta di identità nazionale di Spagna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10453">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10454">una lettera maiuscola "L" (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10454">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10455">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10455">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10456">una lettera maiuscola (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10456">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10457">Spagnoli residenti di età inferiore a 14 anni senza carta d'identità nazionale spagna:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10457">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10458">una lettera maiuscola "K" (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10458">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10459">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10459">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10460">una lettera maiuscola (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10460">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10461">Stranieri con numero di identificazione di uno straniero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10461">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10462">una lettera maiuscola che è "X", "Y" o "Z" (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10462">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10463">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10463">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10464">una lettera maiuscola (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10464">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10465">Stranieri senza numero di identificazione di uno straniero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10465">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10466">una lettera maiuscola che è "M" (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10466">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10467">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10467">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10468">una lettera maiuscola (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10468">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10469">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10469">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10470">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10470">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10471">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10471">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10472">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10472">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10473">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10473">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10474">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10474">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10475">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10475">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10476">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10476">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
