## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10507">SQL Server stringa di connessione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10507">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10508">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10509">La stringa "User Id", "User ID", "uid" o "UserId" seguita dai caratteri e dalle stringhe descritti nel modello seguente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10509">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10510">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10510">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10511">la stringa "User Id", "User ID", "uid" o "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10511">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10512">qualsiasi combinazione di 1-200 lettere minuscole o maiuscole, cifre, simboli, caratteri speciali o spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10512">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10513">la stringa "Password" o "pwd" dove "pwd" non è preceduta da una lettera minuscola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10513">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10514">un segno di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10514">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10515">qualsiasi carattere che non sia un simbolo del dollaro ($), un simbolo di percentuale (%), un simbolo di maggiore di (>), un simbolo di simbolo (@), virgolette ("), un punto e virgola (;), una parentesi graffa sinistra([) o una parentesi quadra sinistra ({)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10515">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10516">qualsiasi combinazione di 7-128 caratteri che non siano un punto e virgola (;), barra (/) o virgolette (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10516">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10517">un punto e virgola (;) o virgolette (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10517">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10518">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10518">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10519">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10519">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10520">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10520">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10521">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10521">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10522">L'espressione regolare CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10522">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10523">Una parola chiave CEP_GlobalFilter non viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10523">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10524">L'espressione CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder non trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10524">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10525">L'espressione CEP_CommonExampleKeywords non trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10525">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10533">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate identifica queste parole chiave utilizzando un'espressione regolare e non un elenco di parole chiave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10533">This sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10534">Password o pwd seguiti da 0-2 spazi, un segno di uguale (=), 0-2 spazi e un asterisco (\*) -OR-</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10534">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) -OR-</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10535">Password o pwd seguito da:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10535">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>

    - <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10537">Simbolo minore di (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10537">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10538">Qualsiasi combinazione di 1-200 caratteri maiuscoli o minuscoli, cifre, asterisco (\*), trattino (-), sottolineatura (_) o spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10538">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10539">Simbolo maggiore di (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10539">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10553">Numero di patente di guida in Svezia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10553">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10554">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10554">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10555">10 cifre contenenti una lineetta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10555">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10556">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10556">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10557">10 cifre contenenti un trattino:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10557">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10558">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10558">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10559">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10559">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10560">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10560">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10561">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10562">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10562">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10563">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10564">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10564">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10565">L'espressione  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10565">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10566">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10566">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10699">Svezia - ID nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10699">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10700">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10700">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10701">10 o 12 cifre e un delimitatore facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10701">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10702">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10702">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10703">10 o 12 cifre e un delimitatore facoltativo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10703">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10704">due cifre (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10704">two digits (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10705">Sei cifre nel formato data AAMMGG</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10705">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10706">delimitatore di "-" o "+" (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10706">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10707">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10707">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10708">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10709">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10709">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10710">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10711">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10711">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10712">La funzione `Func_swedish_national_identifier` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10712">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10713">Viene trovata una parola `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` chiave da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10713">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10714">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10714">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10715">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10715">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10716">La funzione `Func_swedish_national_identifier` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10716">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10717">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10717">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10736">Svezia - numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10736">Sweden passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10737">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10737">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10738">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10738">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10739">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10739">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10740">otto cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10740">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10741">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10741">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10742">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10742">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10743">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10743">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10744">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10744">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10745">l'espressione regolare Regex_sweden_passport_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10745">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10746">viene trovata `Keywords_eu_passport_number` una parola chiave da o `Keyword_sweden_passport` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10746">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10747">l'espressione regolare trova una data nel formato `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AA (01 JAN/JAN 12) o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10747">the regular expression `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` finds a date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10748">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10748">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10749">l'espressione regolare Regex_sweden_passport_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10749">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10750">viene trovata `Keywords_eu_passport_number` una parola chiave da o `Keyword_sweden_passport` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10750">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10786">Numero di identificazione fiscale svezia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10786">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10787">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10787">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10788">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10788">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10789">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10789">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10790">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10790">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10791">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10791">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10792">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10792">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10793">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10793">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10794">10 cifre e un simbolo nel motivo specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10794">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10795">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10795">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10796">10 cifre e un simbolo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10796">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10797">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10797">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10798">segno più o meno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10798">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10799">tre cifre che rendono univoco il numero di identificazione dove:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10799">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10800">per i numeri emessi prima del 1990, la settima e l'ottava cifra identificano la provincia di nascita o i nati all'estero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10800">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10801">la cifra nella nona posizione indica il sesso per dispari per il maschio o anche per la donna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10801">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10802">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10802">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10803">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10803">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10804">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10804">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10805">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10805">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10806">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10806">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10807">La funzione  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10807">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10808">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10808">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10809">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10809">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10810">La funzione  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10810">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10836">Codice SWIFT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10836">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10837">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10838">quattro lettere seguite da 5-31 lettere o cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10838">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10839">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10839">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10840">quattro lettere seguite da 5-31 lettere o cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10840">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10841">Codice bancario di quattro lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10841">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10842">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10842">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10843">4-28 lettere o cifre (BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10843">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10893">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10893">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10894">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10894">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10895">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10895">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10897">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10897">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10898">Numero a 13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10898">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10899">tre cifre - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10899">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10900">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10900">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10901">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10901">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10902">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10902">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10903">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10903">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10904">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10904">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10905">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10905">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10906">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10906">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10907">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10907">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10908">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10908">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10909">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10909">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10910">La funzione Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10910">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10911">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10911">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10912">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10912">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10913">La funzione Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10913">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10934">Taiwan - Numero di identificazione nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10934">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10935">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10935">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10936">una lettera (in inglese) seguita da nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10936">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10937">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10937">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10938">una lettera (in inglese) seguita da nove cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10938">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10939">una lettera (in inglese, senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10939">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10940">la cifra "1" o "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10940">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10941">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10941">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10942">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10942">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10943">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10943">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10944">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10944">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10945">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10945">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10946">La funzione Func_taiwanese_national_id restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10946">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10947">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_taiwanese_national_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10947">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10948">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10948">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10949">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10949">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10950">La funzione Func_taiwanese_national_id restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10950">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10951">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10951">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10968">Numero di passaporto taiwanese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10968">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10969">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10969">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10970">Numero di passaporto biometrico: nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10970">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10971">numero di passaporto non biometrico: nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10971">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10972">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10972">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10973">numero di passaporto biometrico:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10973">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10974">il carattere "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10974">the character "3"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10975">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10975">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10976">numero di passaporto non biometrico:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10976">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10977">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10977">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10978">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10979">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10979">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10980">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10981">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10982">L'espressione regolare Regex_taiwan_passport trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10982">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10983">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_taiwan_passport da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10983">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10994">Numero di certificato residente a Taiwan (ARC/TARC)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10994">Taiwan-resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10995">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10995">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10996">10 lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10996">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-10997">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10997">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-10998">10 lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10998">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-10999">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-10999">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11000">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11000">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11001">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11001">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11002">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11002">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11003">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11003">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11004">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11004">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11005">L'espressione regolare Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11005">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11006">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11006">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11020">Codice di identificazione della popolazione thai</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11020">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11021">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11021">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11022">13 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11022">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11023">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11023">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11024">13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11024">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11025">la prima cifra non è zero o nove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11025">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11026">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11026">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11027">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11027">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11028">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11028">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11029">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11029">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11030">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11030">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11031">La funzione Func_Thai_Citizen_Id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11031">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11032">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11032">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11033">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11033">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11034">La funzione Func_Thai_Citizen_Id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11034">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11042">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11042">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>

## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11043">Numero di identificazione nazionale turco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11043">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11044">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11044">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11045">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11045">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11046">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11046">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11047">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11047">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11048">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11048">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11049">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11049">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11050">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11050">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11051">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11051">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11052">La funzione Func_Turkish_National_Id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11052">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11053">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_Turkish_National_Id da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11053">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11054">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11054">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11055">La funzione Func_Turkish_National_Id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11055">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11062">Regno Unito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11062">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11063">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11063">driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11064">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11064">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11065">Combinazione di 18 lettere e numeri nel formato specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11065">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11066">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11066">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11067">18 lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11067">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11068">Cinque lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) o la cifra "9" al posto di una lettera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11068">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11069">Una cifra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11069">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11070">Cinque cifre nel formato di data MMDDY per la data di nascita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11070">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11071">Il settimo carattere viene incrementato di 50 se driver è femminile. per exampe, da 51 a 62 invece che da 01 a 12.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11071">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11072">Due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) o la cifra "9" al posto di una lettera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11072">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11073">Cinque cifre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11073">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11074">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11074">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11075">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11075">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11076">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11076">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11077">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11077">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11078">La funzione `Func_uk_drivers_license` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11078">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11079">Viene trovata una parola `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11079">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11080">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11080">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11081">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11081">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11082">La funzione `Func_uk_drivers_license` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11082">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11083">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11083">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11204">Regno Unito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11204">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11205">numero di rullino elettorale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11205">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11206">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11206">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11207">due lettere seguite da 1-4 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11207">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11208">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11208">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11209">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) seguite da 1-4 numeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11209">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11210">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11210">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11211">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11211">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11212">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11212">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11213">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11213">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11214">L'espressione regolare Regex_uk_electoral restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11214">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11215">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_electoral.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11215">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11217">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11217">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11219">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11219">nomination form</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11220">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11220">electoral register</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11221">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11221">electoral roll</span></span>


## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11222">Regno Unito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11222">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11223">numero del servizio sanitario nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11223">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11224">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11224">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11225">10-17 cifre separate da spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11225">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11226">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11226">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11227">10-17 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11227">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11228">3 o 10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11228">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11229">uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11229">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11230">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11230">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11231">uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11231">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11232">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11232">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11233">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11233">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11234">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11234">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11235">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11235">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11236">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11236">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11237">La funzione Func_uk_nhs_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11237">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11238">Si verifica una delle situazioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11238">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11239">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_nhs_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11239">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11240">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_nhs_number1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11240">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11241">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11241">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11242">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11242">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11248">health authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11248">health authority</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11260">Regno Unito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11260">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11261">national insurance number (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11261">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11262">Questa entità del tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate NUMERO DI IDENTIFICAZIONE NAZIONALE UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11262">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11263">È disponibile anche come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11263">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11264">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11264">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11265">sette o nove caratteri separati da spazi o trattini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11265">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11266">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11266">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11267">due modelli possibili:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11267">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11268">due lettere (i VALORI NINO validi utilizzano solo determinati caratteri in questo prefisso, convalidato da questo modello, senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11268">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11269">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11269">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11270">'A', 'B', 'C' o 'D' (come il prefisso, nel suffisso sono consentiti solo determinati caratteri, senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11270">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11271">OPPURE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11271">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11272">due lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11272">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11273">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11273">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11274">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11274">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11275">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11275">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11276">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11276">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11277">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11277">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11278">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11278">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11279">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11279">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11280">"A", "B", "C" o "D"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11280">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11281">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11281">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11282">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11282">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11283">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11283">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11284">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11284">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11285">La funzione Func_uk_nino restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11285">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11286">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_nino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11286">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11287">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11287">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11288">La funzione Func_uk_nino restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11288">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11310">Regno Unito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11310">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11311">Numero di riferimento fiscale univoco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11311">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11312">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11312">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11313">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11313">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11314">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11314">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11315">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11315">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11316">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11316">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11317">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11317">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11318">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11318">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11319">10 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11319">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>


### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11320">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11320">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11321">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11321">10 digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11325">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11325">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11347">Numero di conto corrente bancario statunitense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11347">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11348">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11348">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11350">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11350">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11351">6-17 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11351">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11352">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11352">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11353">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11353">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11354">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11354">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11355">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11355">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11356">L'espressione regolare Regex_usa_bank_account_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11356">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11357">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_usa_Bank_Account.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11357">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11387">Numero di patente di guida statunitense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11387">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11388">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11388">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11389">Varia in base allo stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11389">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11390">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11390">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11391">dipende dallo stato, ad esempio New York:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11391">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11392">le nove cifre formattate come ddd ddd ddd corrisponderanno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11392">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11393">nove cifre come dddddddddd non corrispondono.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11393">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11394">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11394">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11395">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11395">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11396">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11396">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11397">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11397">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11398">La funzione Func_new_york_drivers_license_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11398">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11399">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11399">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11400">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_us_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11400">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11401">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11401">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11402">La funzione Func_new_york_drivers_license_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11402">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11403">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11403">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11404">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11404">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11405">Non vengono trovate parole chiave da Keyword_us_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11405">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
