## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11503">Numero di identificazione del singolo contribuente statunitense (ITIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11503">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11504">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11504">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11505">nove cifre che iniziano con "9" e contengono "7" o "8" come quarta cifra, facoltativamente formattate con spazi o trattini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11505">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11506">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11506">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11507">formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11507">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11508">la cifra "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11508">the digit "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11509">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11509">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11510">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11510">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11511">a "7" o "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11511">a "7" or "8"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11512">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11512">a digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11513">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11513">a space, or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11514">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11514">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11515">non formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11515">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11516">la cifra "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11516">the digit "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11517">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11517">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11518">a "7" o "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11518">a "7" or "8"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11519">cinque cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11519">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11520">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11520">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11521">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11521">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11522">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11523">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11523">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11524">La funzione Func_formatted_itin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11524">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11525">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_itin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11525">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11526">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11526">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11527">La funzione Func_unformatted_itin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11527">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11528">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_itin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11528">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11529">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11529">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11530">La funzione Func_formatted_itin o Func_unformatted_itin trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11530">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11531">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11531">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11532">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11532">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11533">contribuente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11533">taxpayer</span></span>

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11545">Numero di previdenza sociale statunitense (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11545">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11546">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11546">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11547">nove cifre, che possono essere formattate o non formattate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11547">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11548">Se emesso prima della metà del 2011, un SSN ha una formattazione solida in cui alcune parti del numero devono rientrare in determinati intervalli per essere valide (ma non è presente alcun checksum).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11548">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11549">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11549">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11550">Quattro funzioni ricercano i nomi SSN in quattro modelli diversi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11550">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11551">Func_ssn trova SSN con formattazione forte precedente alla 2011 formattata con trattini o spazi (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd ddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11551">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11552">Func_unformatted_ssn trova SSN con formattazione forte precedente alla versione 2011 non formattata come nove cifre consecutive (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11552">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11553">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn trova sSN post-2011 formattati con trattini o spazi (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd ddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11553">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11554">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn trova SSN post-2011 non formattati come nove cifre consecutive (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11554">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11555">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11555">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11556">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11556">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11557">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11557">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11558">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11558">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11559">La funzione Func_ssn restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11559">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11560">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11560">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11561">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11561">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11562">La funzione Func_unformatted_ssn trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11562">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11563">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11563">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11564">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11564">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11565">La funzione Func_randomized_formatted_ssn restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11565">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11566">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11566">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11567">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11567">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11568">La funzione Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11568">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11569">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11569">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11584">Stati Uniti / Regno Unito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11584">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11585">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11585">passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11586">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11586">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11587">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11587">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11588">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11588">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11589">nove cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11589">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11590">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11590">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11591">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11591">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ef298-11592">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11592">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11593">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11593">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11594">La funzione Func_usa_uk_passport restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11594">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11595">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11595">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11596">Viene trovata una parola `Keywords_eu_passport_date` chiave da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11596">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ef298-11597">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11597">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11598">La funzione Func_usa_uk_passport restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11598">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ef298-11599">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ef298-11599">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. / U.K. Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
